item.description:
TotalCon 24: So many games, so little time!

You are invited to TotalCon 24 this February 18-21, 2010 at the Holiday Inn in Mansfield, MA.

With the largest selection of gaming events in the region this season, TotalCon is 24 fun-filled days of nothing less than some of the best in gaming. From industry guests, independent games, championship events, role-playing, board games, miniatures, young player track, video games, exhibit hall, art show and more...you'll discover why all dice rolls are leading to TotalCon 24!

Don't settle for less!

Pre-registration for the full 4 days is just $30 or $10 per day plus $1.50 ticket fee per 2 hour block. $40/$15 at the door. Pre-registration will open in January 2010.

Hotel room rates start at $87 with code TCE. Rooms are booking now! The hotel features a heated indoor pool and sauna, on-site restaurant, free parking, and free shuttle service to and from the Amtrak and Mansfield train station for registered hotel guests.

For more information about Total Confusion 24, please visit the website at: http://www.totalcon.c...
item.name: Total Confusion 24
